Articles.Content:
Hi.

Just started playing with vanilla KSP, but haven't found any... construction similar to this.

The idea is that it is possible to add parachutes on top of boosters as well.

Unfortunately, they are lost if deployed on start. So, the first stage are the liquid engines - you lift on 30-100 meters, throw them off and fire the second stage:

5 SASs included, bonus points for landing the capsule safely (easier than you may think).

Your design will actaully work better in 8.5, as they are adding the ability to auto deploy chutes the seconsd the part they are on is seperated from the main rocket.

So good job designing for the near future!
